description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nFrailty:
When this creature {ACTION_attacks} an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_VULNERABLE}, it deals 100% more damage, recovers {STAT_health} equal to 100% of the damage dealt, and removes this debuff.
name: Bile Stitches
